list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who uses X-rays or other high-energy radiation, especially a doctor specializing in radiology.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the radiologist said he could see no cause for concern
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bác sĩ X quang nói rằng anh ta không thể thấy không có nguyên nhân quan tâm
